ai-ds2.3.2:276.2_0: There are three unskillful roots of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-ds2.3.2:276.4_0: These are the things that are refuge with refuge.
ai-ds2.3.2:277.2_0: (There are) wholesome things that are profitable sense-spheres in the formless-world sphere, not in the formless-world sphere.
ai-ds2.3.2:277.3_0: The eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are not consumed by form.
ai-ds2.3.2:277.4_0: These are the things that are without faults.
